Vince Torell was a convicted criminal from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Vince Torell was accused of being a spy for the Absolute. He was arrested, tried, and condemned to public execution of treason. As the Absolutist army marched on Baldurs Gate and unbeknownst to all, the new Grand Duke Lord Gortash being one of the Absolutes leaders, Vince Torell, alongside a fellow prisoner Durm Goroy, was to be transferred from the Stonyeyes Precinct of the Flaming Fist to the Basilisk Gate prison on the orders from Manip Farthingale. Basilisk Gate had a handy plaza with a hanging stage set up for public executions at the time.
